alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 02 at 10:22PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas, northeast Louisiana and Mississippi, including the following counties and parishes, in southeast Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot. In northeast Louisiana, East Carroll, Morehouse, Richland and West Carroll. In Mississippi, Bolivar, Issaquena, Sharkey, Sunflower and Washington. * WHEN...Through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall amounts of two to four inches are expected in a short period of time, with isolated higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
